create-project.subtitle: Create your own project for your event or anything else
create-project.err-incomplete: Can't create project before all fields are complete and valid. Please fill missing fields 👁
create-project.success: Project created successfully! Next - create your first task
create-project.task-types-explain: It's recommended to divide the tasks into type so it would be easier to filter afterwards. For example - Event planning, Shifts, Other. You can have up to 5 task types.

projects.header: All the projects in the world
projects.name: Name

task.name: Task name
task.is-critical: Is task critical for the event?
task.creator: Dreamer
task.creating-new: Almost there... Please enter all the tasks fields and press Save to finish
task.cant-take-messages: Cannot take tasks at the moment
task.cant-take-messages-limit: You've reach the limit of task for one user, cannot take more tasks at this point
task.unassigned: Task responsibility removed, task is now free
task.maximum-reached: You've reached the max amount of tasks you can create
task.new-tasks-closed: New task creation is currently on hold
task.user-cannot-assign: The platform is closed now for new users. You cannot take missions only view them.
task.user-new-tasks-closed: Creating new tasks is closed now for new users. You cannot create tasks just view the existing tasks.
task.input-tags: Input At least one Tag, or select from suggested tags (Press Enter to accept)
task.mission-incomplete-short: Can't save task before all fields are complete. Please fill missing fields 👁
task.mission-incomplete: It is not possible to save a task before filling all the fields. Do you wish to stay in this task? Pressing cancel will erase the task
task.do-you-take-ownership: Would you like to take ownership over this task?
task.do-you-take-ownership2: In case you won't. She would stay open till someone would take responsibility over her.

errors.min-3: This field must have at least 3 characters

user.email: Your email address (Will be used to notify me when someone comment on my task):

comments.title: Comments
comments.placeholder: This is the place to comment. Is there someone you think the task owner should talk to? Is there anything they should know?

welcome.heading: Welcome to the doocrate
welcome.heading2: A co-creational events task management system
welcome.registration: Upon registering you will be transferred to the task system
welcome.before-start: A few important notes before we begin:
welcome.instruction1: Anyone can take ownership of a task (As long as it's unassigned)
welcome.instruction2: Please only take ownership of one task to allow everyone to participate
welcome.instruction3: Anyone can offer any task, even without registering to the system
welcome.instruction4: The event will only happen if all critical tasks are met
welcome.instruction5: Everything else, that we won't do - Won't happen :)

footer.people: the humans who crafted this system
